ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fun in Velious
ygData.msgSnippet: ... good idea, but ... ... why didn t you call for a rez? there should be enough (high level) clerics around ... especially when loosing a level, i would try
ygData.messageBody:
On 8 Sep 2002 at 15:31, mlockridge01 wrote:

> I got tired of camping Brutes in Warsliks Woods, so finally made my
> journey to Velious. I took the boat, just to have done it once. Found

good idea, but ...

> I have not been fortunate in hunting. Level 34 puts me low on the
> food chain in EW. I have tried my standard hunting routine from the
... this is true.

> [...]
> offered to train them away, and did so. I got my corpse and got my
> stuff back, but am now a high 33 again.

why didn't you call for a rez? there should be enough (high level) clerics around ... especially when loosing a level, i would try
to get a 49+ rez.


> I may have to rethink my Velious career. Solo at 34 in EW seems a bit
> tough, even if I need the tufts.

try IC and go for cougars, or move further to GD (and thurgadin - the lovely dwarven town) and hunt tizmaks (lowest level i hit
them with a group was with 2x26 monk, but i had to bring my cleric after some rounds).

or try Drakkel Wolves if you want to go for thurgadin and skyshrine faction ... the Tracking Wolves should be a bit lower, and
give you good faction with Kael (frost giants) but lower it with Thurgadin.


IMHO it is better to start with Thurgadin (and SS) faction, because it makes the start in Velious easier: two zones you can
call home (or actually use the bank ... :-). also - if your SS faction is good enough - you can gate/port to WL without
checking if Wuoshi is up (normally this poor lady is killed every week). and if you start hunting in CS (another quad kiter ... :-
( ... zone is still popular for this, but too small to supply many quadders at once) you have a city just one zone away (on the
other hand this shouldn't be really a problem for a druid).

after completing (or getting it to a certain level) some of the thurgadin quests (like the prayer shawl) and you don't need
Thurgadin as a base, you can start to work on your Kael faction with killing Dwarves in icewell keep (this is sort of higher
level stuff). so after some (long) time, you can have SS and Kael faction.


good luck and have fun

- bilt


--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 54 female gnome magician
Tarew Marr
